recipesJson.name: Cobble the Berry 1-2-3
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
A simple, but delicious recipe. Three ingredients all that is needed to build a delicious dark berry cobbler with buttery graham notes. 
3% WF Berry Cobbler
2% WF Boysenberry Raspberry
1% WF Gragham Cracker Pie Crust
Take this and make it your own, add sweetener if you like extra, add some ice cream and make it an a la mode. 
Enjoy 
Tested on Vapefly Pixie .50ohm @40watts and Wasp Nano .37ohm @56watts
